required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Aortic Abdominal Aneurysm Pilot Screening Programme
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of Aortic Abdominal Aneurysm Prevalence in a Population Pilot Screening Program Based on Primary Care Duplex Ultrasound Evaluation

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundació Institut de Recerca de l'Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau

clinical_study.source: Fundació Institut de Recerca de l'Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau

brief_summary.textblock: Populational abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) pilot screening programme performed by duplex ultrasonography in population born in 1952 in health areas depending from Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau in Barcelona. Descriptive data analysis and cost-effectiveness study will be performed.

detailed_description.textblock: Populational abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) pilot screening programme performed by duplex ultrasonography in population born in 1952 in areas depending from Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau in Barcelona. Ultrasonography evaluations will be performed in primary health centers by previously trained doctors according to study protocol and AAA management will be according to United Kingdom's National Health Service screening model. A descriptive analysis will be performed to estimate local population prevalence of AAA in both men and women in order to create the basis for a future state AAA screening programme. A cost-effectiveness analysis will be performed in order to assess optimal screening strategies in our population.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Days (only one day measurement is performed)
primary_outcome.description: Ultrasound infrarrenal aortic diameter measurement in mm

secondary_outcome.description: Defined by current smoker, former smoker (more than one year without smoking) or non smoker
Registry of kind of intervention and date of intervention
First or second degree relatives with AAA, or no family AAA history
Coronary disease, neurovascular disease, peripheral arterial disease or diabetes mellitus
Altered lipid parameters in blood analysis

Complete goldberg anxiety and depression questionnaire. It consists of 12 questions and 5 posible answers for each question, and each answer is rated with 1 to 5 points. Total score above 9 indicates risk of depression.

EuroQOL 5 quality of life evaluation questionnaire. It consistis of 5 questions with 3 posible answers for each question, and a visual analogical scale for self health perception. Each combination of answers indicates a pattern of health status that can be rated.

arm_group.description: Men born in 1952 in Barcelona in health areas depending from Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau.
Aleatory sample of women born in 1952 in Barcelona in health areas depending from Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau.

intervention.description: Abdominal ultrasonography performed by both primary care doctors or vascular surgeons in Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau area

study_pop.textblock: All men and a random sample of women born in 1952 in Barcelona in the area that depends from Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All men in our area's population census and an aleatory sample of women born in 1952 living in Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau area.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previously detected or operated AAA
- Fragile patients not eligible for AAA repair if needed
- Dead people when contacted
- Eligible people refusing to participate
- Eligible people failed to be contacted twice by our department
